title: Mary Kom
writer: Saiwyn Quadras, Ramendra Vasishth, Karan Singh Rathore
short_cast: Priyanka Chopra Jonas, Darshan Kumar, Sunil Thapa, Kenny Basumatary, Shishir Sharma, Robin Das, Rajni Basumatary, Lin Laishram, Shakti Singh
cast: Priyanka Chopra Jonas, Darshan Kumar, Sunil Thapa, Kenny Basumatary, Shishir Sharma, Robin Das, Rajni Basumatary, Lin Laishram, Shakti Singh
genre: Movies Based on Real Life, Hindi-Language Movies, Bollywood Movies, Dramas, Sports Movies, Sports Dramas

desc: The daughter of a poor rice farmer overcomes the objections of her father and the demands of a male-dominated society to pursue a career in boxing.
